comment.author: 92587715@N02
comment._content: The date of the lithographs are wrong as Adelaide was not settled as a Colony until 28-12-1836. Some of the images in CO 1069-596-** are not attributed to the correct artists, but the originals will need sighting to sort this out.

comment.author: 32600408@N06
comment._content: Dear National Archives UK, Thank you for posting these images from South Australia's colonial past. Shearing2013 is correct in saying that European colonisation of South Australia did not begin until 1836. See guides.slsa.sa.gov.au/immigration Bibliographic information re the 14 Views of Old Adelaide can be viewed at images.slsa.sa.gov.au/mpcimg/09500/B9483.htm Jenny Scott, Content Services Librarian

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Thank you for your feedback. I have checked the date printed on the original documents. I have corrected the descriptions and date for the images in this set. Thanks again for your comments
